def palindrome(a):
    print('3')
    print('L', 2)
    print('R', 2)
    print('R', 2 * len(a) - 1)
    return ''
print(palindrome(input()))

s = input()
print(3)

def L(s, i):
    print('L', i)
    return s[1:i][::-1] + s

def R(s, i):
    print('R', i)
    return s + s[i - 1:-1][::-1]
s = L(s, 2)
s = R(s, 2)
s = R(s, len(s) - 1)
assert s == s[::-1]
